div.pre: 1672 Abusir (anc. Busiris), 30 km. SW of (7) El Mans√ªra, 1901 Burial: 325-300 B.C.? (Jenkins) Contents: 9 AV, 44 AR. Pot hoard from ruins of Sun temple Philip II and Alexander III: st. and tetradr. Disposition: Alexandria, Berlin AA 1901, p. 59 (no details)
